headline: Micron to cease chip sales to China, bitcoin sinks to 4-month low
desc:
Market Catalysts host Allie Canal tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including Micron Technology's (MU) move to stop supplying chips to data centers in China, bitcoin (BTC-USD) plunging this week to a four-month low, and Apple (AAPL) signing a deal to be the official broadcaster of Formula One (FWONK, FWONA).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
